channel.title: Anthony Mackie on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Anthony Mackie Jokes He’s the “White Dude Legend” After Multiple Co-Stars Earned Emmy and Oscar Nominations
item.description: The Marvel actor also revealed why he’s happy to come in second place after being nominated for a guest actor Emmy this year.
